name: Kriv aax
title: The Just

attacks.name: Longsword
attacks.notes: Versatile (1d10 when used with two hands).

equipment: Chain mail, a longsword, a shield, a holy symbol, and an explorer's pack.

personality.traits: I'm always polite and respectful, and I never forget my manners.
personality.ideal: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect.
personality.bond: I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
personality.flaw: I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.desc: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

spells.name: Shield of Faith
spells.desc: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.
